title: I finally completed my 499 game chat ban!
body:
Not sure why it was 499 instead of 500, but I just played my last chat ban game just 5 minutes ago!

I am free to rage whenever I please now!

The journey was long and boring, but I have probably a full 3 days until my next chat ban will happen which I am assuming will be a 750 - 1000 chat game ban, but until then IM A FREE SPIRIT AT LAST!

Thank you JESUS!
